  • Keyboard

Class Keyboard

Install a keyboard to grab key down events. By default, the keyboard is installed using the document if the dom is not provided

example
const keyboard = new kepler.Keyboard()
keyboard.addKey('u', e => kepler.changeView('up', controls) )
